name: Realms
description:
Dare you enter the Realms?
Explore an eternal on-chain universe, filled with heroes, villains, magic and monsters.
There are multiple games set in the Realms universe, connected by a shared economy, resources and game assets.
Step forth, begin your journey, and enjoy true ownership of the value you create through play.
short_description: Massive multiplayer on-chain game of economics and chivalry

gallery.description: A fully on-chain fantasy gaming universe that will run forever
You are free to build your might in the Realms however you please.
Will you build powerful armies to conquer your enemies?
Or master the markets to extend your influence?
